markdown:
Underworld dragons embody the pressure between tectonic plates, the heat behind geysers, and flash fires that ignite when the conditions are just right. Natural alchemists, they innately understand reagents and catalysts. While some research the effects of magic on material reactions, the majority of underworld dragons concentrate on building their hoards. They scour the world for carved gemstones and artifacts of precious minerals, both of which they see as distilled essence of earth's bounty. Underworld dragons appear angular and sharp; their scales glow as if superheated from within, and their hair flickers like tongues of flames. An intense fire glows behind their gazes, suggesting they could ignite items with a mere thought, and their breath ripples the air as a testament to the heat contained within their bodies. **[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)): DC 25 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20 [Young Underworld Dragon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1134) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 83 **Perception** +13; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 60 feet, smoke vision **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +11, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +13, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +17, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +17, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +10, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +12, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +11 **Str** +6 **Dex** +2 **Con** +3 **Int** +4 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +1 **Smoke Vision** Smoke doesn't impair an underworld dragon's vision; they ignore the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition from smoke. --- **AC** 25 **Fort** +18 **Ref** +13 **Will** +15 **HP** 115 **Immunities** fire, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145) **Countered by Water** If the underworld dragon takes damage from a spell with the [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) or [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165) trait, the elemental magic of fire within them is momentarily dampened. Until the end of their next turn, they take a –1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls, and their jaws Strikes don't deal fire damage. This limitation ends if the dragon uses Breath Weapon.
**Fed by Wood** When an underworld dragon is struck by a weapon made primarily of wood or affected by a spell with the [plant](/Traits.aspx?ID=125) trait, the dragon's internal fiery essences are stoked with the added fuel. Their breath weapon recharges, and the fire damage from the dragon's jaws increases by one die until the end of the dragon's next turn.
**[Frightful Presence](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=17)** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 90 feet, DC 23 --- **Speed** 40 feet, burrow 30 feet, fly 80 feet **Melee** jaws +18 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8+8 piercing plus 1d6 fire **Melee** claw +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 2d8+8 slashing plus adamantine claws and [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Melee** tail +18 ([reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8+8 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Arcane Innate Spells** DC 25 - **Cantrips (2nd)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) - **2nd** [Continual Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=50) **Adamantine Claws** The dragon's claws are infused with [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374). Their claw Strikes ignore half the Hardness of any object hit. **Breath Weapon** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) The dragon breathes a blast of fire that explodes in a 20-foot burst within 40 feet, dealing 7d6 fire damage (DC 25 basic Reflex save). Creatures that fail the save also take 1d6 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). The dragon can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds. **Coiling Frenzy** The dragon makes one claw Strike and one tail Strike in either order, each against the same target. If either Strike hits, the dragon automatically [Grabs](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) the target. **[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** 2d8+4 bludgeoning, DC 25 **Draconic Momentum** The dragon recharges their Breath Weapon whenever they score a critical hit with a Strike.
